Package org.apache.commons.math4.analysis.integration.gauss

Gauss family of quadrature schemes.

See: Description

  • Class Summary 
    Class Description
    BaseRuleFactory<T extends java.lang.Number>
    Base class for rules that determines the integration nodes and their weights.
    BaseRuleFactoryTest
    Test for BaseRuleFactory.
    GaussianQuadratureAbstractTest
    Base class for standard testing of Gaussian quadrature rules, which are exact for polynomials up to a certain degree.
    GaussIntegrator
    Class that implements the Gaussian rule for integrating a weighted function.
    GaussIntegratorFactory
    Class that provides different ways to compute the nodes and weights to be used by the Gaussian integration rule.
    GaussIntegratorTest
    Test for GaussIntegrator class.
    HermiteParametricTest
    Test of the HermiteRuleFactory.
    HermiteRuleFactory
    Factory that creates a Gauss-type quadrature rule using Hermite polynomials of the first kind.
    HermiteTest
    Test of the HermiteRuleFactory.
    LegendreHighPrecisionParametricTest
    Test of the LegendreHighPrecisionRuleFactory.
    LegendreHighPrecisionRuleFactory
    Factory that creates Gauss-type quadrature rule using Legendre polynomials.
    LegendreHighPrecisionTest
    Test of the LegendreHighPrecisionRuleFactory.
    LegendreParametricTest
    Test of the LegendreRuleFactory.
    LegendreRuleFactory
    Factory that creates Gauss-type quadrature rule using Legendre polynomials.
    LegendreTest
    Test of the LegendreRuleFactory.
    SymmetricGaussIntegrator
    This class's implements integrate method assuming that the integral is symmetric about 0.

Package org.apache.commons.math4.analysis.integration.gauss Description

Gauss family of quadrature schemes.
